  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/3353</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/3353</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">El tangram en flash</string>
            <string language="en">A Flash tangram</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein grelles tangram</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un tangram instantané</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um tangram flash</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un tangram istantaneo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα τανγκράμ λάμψης</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Joc de formar les figures del tangram. Consta de dos nivells de dificultat amb vuit figures cadascun, les quals s'han de construir col·locant les 7 peces que formen el tangram: 1 paral·lelogram, 1 quadrat, 2 triangles grans, 1 triangle mitjà i 2 triangles petits.</string>
            <string language="en">Game using the pieces of a tangram at two levels of difficulty, each comprising 8 figures which must be made up with the 7 pieces of the tangram: 1 parallelogram, 1 square, 2 large triangles, 1 medium-size triangle and 2 small triangles.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">atenció</string>
            <string language="en">attention</string>
            <string language="es">atención</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">observació</string>
            <string language="en">observation</string>
            <string language="es">observación</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">percepció</string>
            <string language="en">perception</string>
            <string language="es">percepción</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">joc</string>
            <string language="en">play</string>
            <string language="es">juego</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">raonament</string>
            <string language="en">reasoning</string>
            <string language="es">razonamiento</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spiel, die Stücke eines tangram bei zwei Stufen 
Schwierigkeit verwendend, jeden enthaltene 8 Abbildungen, die mit den 
7 Stücken des tangram gebildet werden müssen: 1 
Parallelogramm, 1 Quadrat, 2 große Dreiecke, 1 mittelgrosses Dreieck 
und 2 kleine Dreiecke.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Jeu en utilisant les morceaux d'un tangram à 
deux niveaux de difficulté, chaque 8 figures de comportement qui 
doivent se composer avec les 7 morceaux du tangram : 1 
parallélogramme, 1 place, 2 grandes triangles, 1 triangle de taille 
moyenne et 2 petites triangles.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Jogo usando as partes de um tangram em dois 
níveis da dificuldade, cada 8 figuras compreendendo que devem ser 
compostas com as 7 partes do tangram: 1 paralelogramo, 1 
quadrado, 2 triângulos grandes, 1 triângulo medium-size e 2 
triângulos pequenos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gioco usando le parti di un tangram a due livelli
della difficoltà, ogni 8 figure contenenti che devono comporrsi con 
le 7 parti del tangram: 1 parallelogramma, 1 quadrato, 2 grandi 
triangoli, 1 triangolo di taglia media e 2 piccoli triangoli.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παιχνίδι που χρησιμοποιεί τα κομμάτια ενός τανγκράμ 
σε δύο επίπεδα δυσκολίας, κάθε ένα που περιλαμβάνει 8 αριθμούς 
που πρέπει να αποτελεσθούν με τα 7 κομμάτια του τανγκράμ: 1 
παραλληλόγραμμο, 1 τετράγωνο, 2 μεγάλα τρίγωνα, 1 μεσαίου 
μεγέθους τρίγωνο και 2 μικρά τρίγωνα.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Aufmerksamkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beobachtung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vorstellung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spiel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
